required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Analysis of the Molecular Profile of the Mixofibrosarcoma of the Extremities
clinical_study.official_title: Analysis of the Molecular Profile of the Mixofibrosarcoma of the Extremities: Diagnostic and Prognostic Impact

brief_summary.textblock:
Single institution case series review with a histological diagnosis of mixofibrosarcoma of the extremities from 01 Jan 1993 to 01 Dec 2017.
The study will exam all the clinical, radiological, histological and immunohistochemical features of this tumour in all samples and in a limited serie of cases the presence of mutation of 50 genes cancer related.

primary_outcome.description: identify patients with different risk classes in terms of disease-free survival (local and systemic recurrence).
identify patients with different risk classes in terms of overall survival.

intervention.intervention_name: case series review of clinical and histological data
intervention.description: We will review all the medical records, radiological imaging, and histological data of these cases. The immunohistochemical analysis of the principal alterated genes identified in this tumor will be performed.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with a diagnosis of Mixofibrosarcoma treated at the Rizzoli Institute from 1 January 1993 up to 01 December 2017

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Male and female patients treated at Rizzoli Institute from 01 Jan 1993 to 01 Dec 2017
2. Diagnosis of mixofibrosarcoma of extremities
3. Histological slides/formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded tissue tumor (FFPE) blocks from archive available to perform the histology analysis and molecular analysis
4. Enough tumor biobanked material available for molecular analysis
5. Presence of the biobank signed informed consent
6. Written informed consent prior to any study-specific analysis and/or data collection
Exclusion Criteria:
1) Patients with histological diagnosis different from mixofibrosarcoma of extremities

results_reference.citation: Mentzel T, Calonje E, Wadden C, Camplejohn RS, Beham A, Smith MA, Fletcher CD. Myxofibrosarcoma. Clinicopathologic analysis of 75 cases with emphasis on the low-grade variant. Am J Surg Pathol. 1996 Apr;20(4):391-405.

Gronchi A, Lo Vullo S, Colombo C, Collini P, Stacchiotti S, Mariani L, Fiore M, Casali PG. Extremity soft tissue sarcoma in a series of patients treated at a single institution: local control directly impacts survival. Ann Surg. 2010 Mar;251(3):506-11. doi: 10.1097/SLA.0b013e3181cf87fa.

Kaya M, Wada T, Nagoya S, Sasaki M, Matsumura T, Yamaguchi T, Hasegawa T, Yamashita T. MRI and histological evaluation of the infiltrative growth pattern of myxofibrosarcoma. Skeletal Radiol. 2008 Dec;37(12):1085-90. doi: 10.1007/s00256-008-0542-4. Epub 2008 Jul 16.
